data.title: News and Conferences for Media, Advertising and Marketing Professionals
data.meta_description: MediaPost Publications is an on-line publishing resource for all advertising media professionals - TV, cable, radio, print, interactive, agencies, buyers, and reps - providing news, articles and commentary.
